trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event occurs when rows are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>加入資料列時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將使用新的記錄，資料列的新資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>值的處理常式中這個事件是等於新的記錄，也就是大於剛才加入的資料列的資料列的新位置的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入資料列以程式設計的方式，不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>值是加入第一個資料列的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first added row.
trans-unit.target: 第一個加入的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that have been added.
Gets the number of rows that have been added.
trans-unit.target: 取得已加入的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that have been added.
Gets the index of the first added row.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一個加入的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value of this property is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將使用新資料錄的資料列的新資料列時，這個屬性的值等於新的記錄的資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the value of this property is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: 當您以程式設計方式加入資料列時，不過，這個屬性的值會是加入第一個資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first added row.
trans-unit.target: 第一個加入的資料列索引。
